_a-0000ed8a-02db-8000-9dfc-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_UT_displayDocumentName
_a-0000ed8a-02db-8000-9dfc-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
if(
  a!isNullOrEmpty(value: ri!document),
  {},
  a!match(
    value: ri!sourceApplicationId,
    equals: cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_SOURCE_APPLICATION_VM,
    then: rule!AS_GSS_UT_displayVmDocumentName(
      documentName: ri!documentName,
      extension: ri!extension,
      version: ri!version,
      bundle: ri!bundle
    ),
    default: rule!AS_GSS_UT_findDocumentNameAndExtensionById(documetId: ri!document).nameWithExtension
  )
)

_a-0000e6cd-618a-8000-9bd9-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_checkIsNullOrEmpty

_a-0000eb72-c933-8000-9d28-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_QR_getEvaluation
_a-0000eb72-c933-8000-9d28-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryRecord(
  recordType: recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD,
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  executeWhen: ri!executeWhen,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  aggregationFields: ri!aggregationFields,
  fields: ri!fields,
  relatedRecordData: ri!relatedRecordData,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationId,
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!evaluationId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationNumber,
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!evaluationNumber
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationStatusId,
      operator: "in",
      value: {
        cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_SETTING_UP,
        cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_INPROGRESS,
        cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_AWARDEES_SELECTED,
        cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_COMPLETE
      }
    ),
    ri!additionalFilters
  },
  sort: ri!sort
)

_a-0000e3e6-fb42-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.name: AS_ADT_UT_buildSimpleFieldChanges

_a-0000eb7c-0389-8000-9d2c-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_UT_CompareLists

_a-0000e5da-a251-8000-9bbe-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GAM_ADT_UT_getOriginalObjects

_a-0000e3e6-fb42-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.name: AS_ADT_UT_determineAuditActionCode
_a-0000e3e6-fb42-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
choose(
  where(
    {
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!externalAction),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(index(ri!originalObject, ri!auditConfig.idField, null)),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(index(ri!newObject, ri!auditConfig.idField, null)),
      toboolean(index(ri!originalObject, "isActive", 1)) = toboolean(index(ri!newObject, "isActive", 1)),
      toboolean(index(ri!originalObject, "isActive", false)),
      toboolean(index(ri!newObject, "isActive", true))
    }
  )[1],
  ri!externalAction,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_ADD,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_DELETE,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_MODIFY,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_DEACTIVATE,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_REACTIVATE
)

rule!AS_ADT_UT_calculateAudit(
    originalObjects: ri!auditParams.originalObjects,
    newObjects: ri!auditParams.newObjects,
    objectTypeNumber: ri!auditParams.objectTypeNumber,
    namespace: ri!auditParams.namespace,
    username: ri!auditParams.username,
    auditConfig: ri!auditParams.auditConfig,
    externalAction:ri!auditParams.externalAction
  )

_a-0000ee0b-274d-8000-9e1b-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_FM_evaluationTaskForLpta
_a-0000ee0b-274d-8000-9e1b-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!bundle: rule!AS_GSS_CO_UT_loadBundleFromFolder(langISOCode: null),
  local!isSingleAwardType: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.idvAwardTypeId] = cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_IDV_AWARD_TYPE_SINGLE,
  local!isSLGToggleOn: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
    nullableValue: ri!isSLGToggleOn,
    replacementValue: rule!AS_GSS_EnableOrDisableStateAndLocalGovernment_wrapper()
  ),
  local!pageConfig: a!refreshVariable(
    value: rule!AS_GSS_updatePagingConfigurationForLptaEvaluation(
      allEvaluationVendors: ri!allEvaluationVendors,
      isSingleAwardType: local!isSingleAwardType
    ),
    refreshOnReferencedVarChange: false()
  ),
  local!consolidatedDocs: rule!AS_GSS_UT_returnConsolidatedDocListForLPTAEvaluationTask(
    bundle: local!bundle,
    vendor: ri!allEvaluationVendors[local!pageConfig.currentVendorIndex],
    evaluation: ri!evaluation
  ),
  local!buttonConfig: rule!AS_GSS_UT_buttonConfigsForlptaEvaluationTask(
    allEvaluationVendors: ri!allEvaluationVendors,
    pageConfig: local!pageConfig,
    currentEvaluationvendor: ri!allEvaluationVendors[local!pageConfig.currentVendorIndex],
    isSingleAwardType: local!isSingleAwardType
  ),
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_formLayout_v1"(
    skipAutoFocus: true(),
    backgroundColor: rule!AS_GSS_BrandingValueByKey(
      brandingKey: "DefaultBackground",
      useSuiteBranding: true
    ),
    label: "LPTA Evaluation",
    instructions: "Required fields are marked with an asterisk (*)",
    contents: rule!AS_GSS_CPS_lptaEvaluationTaskContentsPerVendor(
      bundle: local!bundle,
      pageConfig: local!pageConfig,
      isSLGToggleOn: local!isSLGToggleOn,
      consolidatedDocs: local!consolidatedDocs,
      isSingleAwardType: local!isSingleAwardType,
      evaluationVendor: ri!allEvaluationVendors[local!pageConfig.currentVendorIndex],
      allEvaluationVendors: ri!allEvaluationVendors
    ),
    buttons: rule!AS_GSS_BTN_buttonsForLPTAEvaluationTask(
      evaluation: ri!evaluation,
      bundle: local!bundle,
      pageConfig: local!pageConfig,
      buttonConfig: local!buttonConfig,
      buttonAction: ri!buttonAction,
      allEvaluationVendors: ri!allEvaluationVendors
    )
  )
)

rule!AS_CO_UT_queryEntity(
  entity: cons!AS_GSS_TMG_ENT_R_TASK_CATEGORY,
  entityType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS:TMG}AS_GSS_TMG_R_TaskCategory',
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "taskCategoryId",
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!taskCategoryId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "categoryName",
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!categoryName
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "isActive",
      operator: "=",
      value: true,
      applyWhen: ri!includeNotActive <> true
    )
  }   
)

rule!AS_CO_UT_queryRecord(
  recordType: recordType!AS_GSS_VendorPriceBreakup_SYNCEDRECORD,
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  executeWhen: ri!executeWhen,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  aggregationFields: ri!aggregationFields,
  fields: ri!fields,
  relatedRecordData: ri!relatedRecordData,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS_GSS_VendorPriceBreakup_SYNCEDRECORD.evalVendorId,
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!evalVendorId,
      applyWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_checkIsNullOrEmpty(
        value: ri!evalVendorId
      )
    ),
    ri!additionalFilters
  },
  sort: ri!sort
)

_a-0000e6a4-3c85-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_indexWhere

_a-0000ed08-d796-8000-9dda-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_UT_convertDocumentRecordDataToDictionaryForAudit
_a-0000ed08-d796-8000-9dda-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
if(
  rule!AS_CO_UT_checkIsNullOrEmpty(
    value: ri!document[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationDocumentId]
  ),
  {},
  rule!AS_CO_UT_cast(
    type: 'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Dictionary',
    value: a!map(
      evalDocumentId: ri!document[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationDocumentId],
      appianDocId: ri!document[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.appianDocId],
      evaluationId: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationId],
      consensusId: ri!document[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.consensusId],
      criteriaId: ri!document[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.criteriaId],
      vendorId: ri!document[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorId],
      taskId: ri!document[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.taskId],
      documentName: ri!document[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.documentName],
      documentDesc: ri!document[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.documentDescription],
      fileType: ri!document[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.fileType],
      docType: rule!AS_CO_UT_cast(
        type: 'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Dictionary',
        value: a!map(
          refDataId: ri!document[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.docType]
        )
      ),
      docTemplate: ri!document[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.documentTemplate],
      createdBy: ri!document[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.createdBy],
      createdDatetime: ri!document[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.createdDatetime],
      modifiedBy: ri!document[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedBy],
      modifiedDatetime: ri!document[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedDatetime],
      isDeleted: ri!document[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.isDeleted],
      sourceApplication: rule!AS_CO_UT_cast(
        type: 'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Dictionary',
        value: a!map(
          refDataId: ri!document[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.sourceApplicationId]
        )
      )
    )
  )
)

_a-0000ed2d-b9af-8000-9de8-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_UT_convertVendorRecordDataToDictionaryForAudit
_a-0000ed2d-b9af-8000-9de8-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
/*Revisit all the field mappings when it is changed from CDT to Records*/
if(
  rule!AS_CO_UT_checkIsNullOrEmpty(
    value: ri!vendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationId]
  ),
  {},
  rule!AS_CO_UT_cast(
    type: 'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Dictionary',
    value: a!map(
      vendorId: ri!vendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorId],
      vendorRefId: ri!vendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorRefId],
      evaluation: rule!AS_GSS_UT_convertEvaluationRecordDataToDictionaryForAudit(
        evaluation: ri!evaluation
      ),
      submittedDate: rule!AS_GSS_UT_convertDateTimeFromOrToGMT(
        value: ri!vendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.submittedDate],
        toGmt: true()
      ),
      legalName: ri!vendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.legalName],
      businessName: ri!vendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.businessName],
      vendorAddressLine1: ri!vendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorAddressLine1],
      vendorAddressLine2: ri!vendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorAddressLine2],
      vendorCity: ri!vendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorCity],
      vendorState: ri!vendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorState],
      vendorCountry: ri!vendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorCountry],
      vendorZipCode: ri!vendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorZipCode],
      vendorZipCodeExt: ri!vendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorZipCodeExt],
      vendorForeignPostalCode: ri!vendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorForeignPostalCode],
      duns: ri!vendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.duns],
      cageCode: ri!vendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.cageCode],
      uniqueEntityId: ri!vendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.uniqueEntityId],
      status: ri!vendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.status],
      expirationDate: ri!vendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.expirationDate],
      sourceApplication: ri!vendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.sourceApplicationId],
      isActive: ri!vendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive],
      totalPrice: ri!vendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.totalPrice],
      pricingNotes: ri!vendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.pricingNotes],
      priceBreakup: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        items: ri!vendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.priceBreakup],
        expression: a!map(
          itemId: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_VendorPriceBreakup_SYNCEDRECORD.itemId],
          evalVendorId: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_VendorPriceBreakup_SYNCEDRECORD.evalVendorId],
          itemDescription: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_VendorPriceBreakup_SYNCEDRECORD.itemDescription],
          unitPrice: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_VendorPriceBreakup_SYNCEDRECORD.unitPrice],
          quantity: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_VendorPriceBreakup_SYNCEDRECORD.quantity],
          amount: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_VendorPriceBreakup_SYNCEDRECORD.amount],
          isActive: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_VendorPriceBreakup_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive]
        )
      )
    )
  )
)

cast(
  typeof(a!flatten(ri!records)),
  filter(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_zInternal_filterRecordByFieldValue_Multiple(
      record: _,
      field: ri!field,
      values: ri!values
    ),
    a!flatten(ri!records)
  )
)

_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
with(
  local!fieldsAndIndices: rule!AS_CO_UT_zINTERNAL_indexPath_nestedFieldArrayHandler(field: ri!field),

  reduce(
    index(_, _, ri!indexDefault),
    ri!cdt,
    local!fieldsAndIndices
  )
)

_a-0000ed49-6a91-8000-9dee-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_UTIL_processDocumentName
_a-0000ed49-6a91-8000-9dee-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!hasNoExtension: search(".", ri!docName) = 0,
  local!namePart: if(
    local!hasNoExtension,
    ri!docName,
    regexsearch(
      pattern: ".*(?=\.)",
      searchString: ri!docName,
      regexFlags: "i"
    )[1].match
  ),
  local!extension: if(
    local!hasNoExtension,
    "",
    regexsearch(
      pattern: "[^\.]*$",
      searchString: ri!docName,
      regexFlags: "i"
    )[1].match
  ),
  a!map(
    nameWithExtension: concat(local!namePart, ".", local!extension),
    name: local!namePart,
    extension: local!extension
  )
)

_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_displayGroupOrUser

_a-0000ee0b-274d-8000-9e1b-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_ButtonLayout"(
  primaryButtons: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_buttonWidget_v1"(
      label: "Save and Close",
      submit: true(),
      value: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_USER_ACTION_SAVE,
      saveInto: { ri!buttonAction },
      style: "OUTLINE",
      showWhen: ri!buttonConfig.saveAndClose.showWhen,
      validate: false(),
      disabled: ri!buttonConfig.saveAndClose.disabled
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_buttonWidget_v1"(
      label: "Next",
      saveInto: {
        a!save(
          ri!pageConfig,
          rule!AS_GSS_updatePagingConfigurationForLptaEvaluation(
            isNextAction: true(),
            pageConfig: ri!pageConfig,
            allEvaluationVendors: ri!allEvaluationVendors
          )
        ),
        if(
          rule!AS_CO_UT_checkIsNullOrEmpty(
            value: index(
              ri!allEvaluationVendors[ri!pageConfig.currentVendorIndex],
              recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.decisionTypeId,
              null
            )
          ),
          a!save(
            ri!allEvaluationVendors[ri!pageConfig.currentVendorIndex],
            #"urn:appian:function:v1:a:update"(
              ri!allEvaluationVendors[ri!pageConfig.currentVendorIndex],
              recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.decisionTypeId,
              cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_VENDOR_DECISION_UNDER_REVIEW
            )
          ),
          {}
        )
      },
      style: "SOLID",
      disabled: ri!buttonConfig.next.disabled,
      showWhen: ri!buttonConfig.next.showWhen,
      validate: true()
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_buttonWidget_v1"(
      label: "Submit",
      submit: true(),
      value: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_USER_ACTION_SUBMIT,
      saveInto: {
        ri!buttonAction,
        a!save(
          ri!allEvaluationVendors,
          rule!AS_GSS_UT_updateVendorDecisionForDeferredVendors(
            evaluationVendors: ri!allEvaluationVendors
          )
        ),
        a!save(
          ri!evaluation,
          rule!AS_GSS_UT_updateRecordsByModelRecord(
            records: ri!evaluation,
            modelRecord: recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD(
              recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationStatusId: cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_AWARDEES_SELECTED,
              recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedBy: loggedInUser(),
              recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedDatetime: now()
            )
          )
        )
      },
      style: "SOLID",
      disabled: ri!buttonConfig.submit.disabled,
      showWhen: ri!buttonConfig.submit.showWhen,
      validate: true()
    )
  },
  secondaryButtons: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_buttonWidget_v1"(
      label: "Cancel",
      value: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_USER_ACTION_CANCEL,
      saveInto: { ri!buttonAction },
      style: "OUTLINE",
      color: "SECONDARY",
      disabled: ri!buttonConfig.cancel.disabled,
      submit: true(),
      validate: false(),
      showWhen: ri!buttonConfig.cancel.showWhen
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_buttonWidget_v1"(
      label: "Back",
      saveInto: {
        a!save(
          ri!pageConfig,
          rule!AS_GSS_updatePagingConfigurationForLptaEvaluation(
            isNextAction: false(),
            pageConfig: ri!pageConfig,
            allEvaluationVendors: ri!allEvaluationVendors
          )
        )
      },
      style: "OUTLINE",
      disabled: ri!buttonConfig.back.disabled,
      showWhen: ri!buttonConfig.back.showWhen
    )
  }
)

_a-0000e5bc-4a9a-8000-9bbc-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_UT_evalDocsStartAuditProcess_Parameters
_a-0000e5bc-4a9a-8000-9bbc-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!externalAction: if(
    ri!isDeleteDocument,
    cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_DELETE,
    cons!AS_GAM_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_UPLOAD
  ),
  rule!AS_ADT_UT_startAuditProcess_Parameters(
    newObjects: ri!evaluationDocuments,
    originalObjects: ri!originalEvalDocuments,
    objectType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS}AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument',
    objectDse: if(
      ri!writeObject = false,
      null,
      cons!AS_GSS_ENT_EVALUATION_DOCUMENT
    ),
    auditDse: cons!AS_GSS_ENT_A_R_EVALUATION,
    auditConfig: rule!AS_GSS_ADT_BL_auditConfig_Evaluation(),
    username: ri!initiator,
    auditType: cons!AS_GAM_ADT_TXT_AUDIT_TYPE_MANIPULATION,
    externalAction: local!externalAction,
    complexFieldName: "documentChanges",
    manipulationAudit: rule!AS_GSS_BL_constructFieldChangesForEvalDocs(
      evaluationDocuments: ri!evaluationDocuments,
      factorDocMapping: ri!factorDocMapping,
      externalAction: local!externalAction,
      originalEvalDocs: ri!originalEvalDocuments,
      originalFactorDocMapping: ri!originalFactorDocMapping
    )
  ).auditParams
)

{
  fieldName: "",
  auditFieldName: "",
  idField: "evaluationId",
  simpleFields: {
    "evaluationNumber",
    "evaluationTitle",
    "evaluationDesc",
    "solicitationId",
    "solicitationDesc",

}

_a-0000ed49-6a91-8000-9dee-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!rawDetails: if(
    a!isNullOrEmpty(ri!documetId),
    "",
    getcontentobjectdetailsbyid(ri!documetId)
  ),
  local!wholeName: index(
    extract(local!rawDetails, "[Name: ", ", UUID:"),
    1,
    null()
  ),
  rule!AS_GSS_UTIL_processDocumentName(docName: local!wholeName)
)

      operator: "in",

    ),

      operator: "in",

    ),

  },

_a-0000e3e6-fb42-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_compareStrong

_a-0000eb32-2fbb-8000-9d0d-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_UT_displayDocumentSize
_a-0000eb32-2fbb-8000-9d0d-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
if(
  ri!sourceApplicationId = cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_SOURCE_APPLICATION_VM,
  cons!AS_GSS_CO_NULL_REPLACEABLE_TEXT,
  a!localVariables(
    local!size: document(ri!document, "size"),
    a!match(
      value: local!size,
      whenTrue: fv!value < 1024,
      then: round(document(ri!document, "size"), 0) & " B",
      whenTrue: fv!value < 1024 * 1024,
      then: round(document(ri!document, "size") / 1024, 0) & " KB",
      whenTrue: fv!value < 1024 * 1024 * 1024,
      then: round(
        document(ri!document, "size") / 1024 / 1024,
        1
      ) & " MB",
      default: round(
        document(ri!document, "size") / 1024 / 1024 / 1024,
        2
      ) & " GB"
    )
  )
)

_a-0000ee15-bcab-8000-9e1f-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_UT_captureMetaDataForTask
_a-0000ee15-bcab-8000-9e1f-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!flatten(
  rule!AS_GSS_UT_captureMetadataForRecords(
    recordType: recordType!AS_GSS_TMG_Task_SYNCEDRECORD,
    modifiedBy: ri!initiator,
    createdByField: recordType!AS_GSS_TMG_Task_SYNCEDRECORD.createdBy,
    createdOnField: recordType!AS_GSS_TMG_Task_SYNCEDRECORD.createdDatetime,
    modifiedByField: recordType!AS_GSS_TMG_Task_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedBy,
    modifiedOnField: recordType!AS_GSS_TMG_Task_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedDatetime,
    isActiveField: {},
    data: rule!AS_GSS_UT_updateRecordsByModelRecord(
      records: ri!task,
      modelRecord: recordType!AS_GSS_TMG_Task_SYNCEDRECORD(
        recordType!AS_GSS_TMG_Task_SYNCEDRECORD.createdBy: a!defaultValue(
          value: ri!task[recordType!AS_GSS_TMG_Task_SYNCEDRECORD.createdBy],
          default: ri!initiator
        ),
        recordType!AS_GSS_TMG_Task_SYNCEDRECORD.createdDatetime: a!defaultValue(
          value: ri!task[recordType!AS_GSS_TMG_Task_SYNCEDRECORD.createdDatetime],
          default: now()
        )
      )
    )
  )
)

{
  auditParams: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:ADT}AS_ADT_P_AuditProcessParameters'(
    newObjects: rule!AS_CO_UT_cast(
      value: ri!newObjects,
      type: rule!AS_CO_UT_returnArrayTypeNumber(type: ri!objectType),
      
    ),

    ),

_a-0000eced-1a08-8000-9dce-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_UT_convertPhaseRecordDataToDictionaryForAudit
_a-0000eced-1a08-8000-9dce-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
if(
  rule!AS_CO_UT_checkIsNullOrEmpty(
    value: ri!phase[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationPhase_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationPhaseId]
  ),
  {},
  rule!AS_CO_UT_cast(
    type: 'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Dictionary',
    value: a!map(
      evaluationPhaseId: ri!phase[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationPhase_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationPhaseId],
      evaluation: rule!AS_CO_UT_cast(
        type: 'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Dictionary',
        value: a!map(
          evaluationId: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationId]
        )
      ),
      refPhase: rule!AS_CO_UT_cast(
        type: 'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Dictionary',
        value: a!map(
          taskCategoryId: ri!phase[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationPhase_SYNCEDRECORD.refPhaseId],
          categoryName: index(
            rule!AS_GSS_TMG_QE_getTaskCategories(
              returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_SINGLE_OBJECT,
              taskCategoryId: ri!phase[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationPhase_SYNCEDRECORD.refPhaseId]
            ),
            "categoryName",
            null
          )
        )
      ),
      duration: ri!phase[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationPhase_SYNCEDRECORD.duration],
      durationUnit: rule!AS_CO_UT_cast(
        type: 'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Dictionary',
        value: a!map(
          refDataId: ri!phase[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationPhase_SYNCEDRECORD.durationUnit]
        )
      ),
      startDate: ri!phase[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationPhase_SYNCEDRECORD.startDate],
      endDate: ri!phase[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationPhase_SYNCEDRECORD.endDate],
      isActive: ri!phase[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationPhase_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive],
      /*Metadata from both the CDTs would be the same. Using AS_GSS_Consensus's data here*/
      createdBy: ri!phase[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationPhase_SYNCEDRECORD.createdBy],
      createdDatetime: ri!phase[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationPhase_SYNCEDRECORD.createdDatetime],
      modifiedBy: ri!phase[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationPhase_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedBy],
      modifiedDatetime: ri!phase[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationPhase_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedDatetime]
    )
  )
)

_a-0000e2cd-bc96-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel
_a-0000e2cd-bc96-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
cast(
  'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Text',
  with(
    local!bundleKeyParse: rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_parseBundleKey(bundleKey: ri!bundleKey),
    local!label: if(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(local!bundleKeyParse.bundleName),
      ri!i18nData[local!bundleKeyParse.labelKey],
      ri!i18nData[local!bundleKeyParse.bundleName][local!bundleKeyParse.labelKey]
    ),
    local!updatedLabel: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
      nullableValue: local!label,
      replacementValue: ri!bundleKey
    ),
    local!updatedLabelForArguments: if(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!arguments),
      local!updatedLabel,
      reduce(
        rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_replaceArgument(input: _, index: _, arguments: ri!arguments),
        local!updatedLabel,
        enumerate(count(ri!arguments)) + 1
      )
    ),
    local!updatedLabelForArguments
  )
)

rule!AS_CO_UT_queryRecord(
  recordType: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument_SYNCEDRECORD,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationDocumentId,
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!evaluationDocumentId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.consensusId,
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!consensusId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.docType,
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!docTypeId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationId,
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!evaluationId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.sourceApplicationId,
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!sourceApplicationId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.appianDocId,
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!appianDocId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.isDeleted,
      operator: "in",
      value: a!defaultValue(value: ri!isDeleted, default: { false })
    ),
    ri!filters
  },
  sort: ri!sortInfo,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  executeWhen: ri!executeWhen,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  fields: ri!fields,

)

_a-0000e5da-a251-8000-9bbe-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_ADT_BL_auditConfig_Criteria
AS_GSS_ADT_BL_auditConfig_EvaluatorTeam
AS_ADT_UT_captureMetadataDuringAudit
_a-0000e5da-a251-8000-9bbe-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_captureMetadataIfUpdated(
  originalCdt: ri!oldObject,
  updatedCdt: if(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(touniformstring(index(ri!auditConfig.complexFields, "fieldName", null))),
    ri!newObject,
    rule!AS_CO_UT_updateCdtFieldsByFieldValuePairs(
      cdt: ri!newObject,
      fieldValuePairs: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        items: ri!auditConfig.complexFields,
        expression: a!localVariables(
          local!complexFieldAuditConfig: fv!item,
          {
            field: local!complexFieldAuditConfig.fieldName,
            value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
              items: ri!newObject[local!complexFieldAuditConfig.fieldName],
              expression: rule!AS_ADT_UT_captureMetadataDuringAudit(
                newObject: fv!item,
                oldObject: if(
                  isnull(ri!oldObject),
                  null,
                  index(
                    rule!AS_CO_UT_filterCdtByField(
                      cdt: ri!oldObject[local!complexFieldAuditConfig.fieldName],
                      field: local!complexFieldAuditConfig.idField,
                      value: fv!item[local!complexFieldAuditConfig.idField]
                    ),
                    1,
                    null
                  )
                ),
                auditConfig: local!complexFieldAuditConfig,
                modifiedBy: ri!modifiedBy
              )
            )
          }
        )
      )
    )
  ),
  modifiedBy: ri!modifiedBy
)

_a-0000ee0b-274d-8000-9e1b-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_CPS_lptaEvaluationTaskContentsPerVendor

_a-0000eced-1a08-8000-9dce-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_UT_convertTeamRecordDataToDictionaryForAudit

_a-0000ecda-a664-8000-9dc8-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_UT_convertEvaluationRecordDataToDictionaryForAudit
_a-0000ecda-a664-8000-9dc8-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
if(
  rule!AS_CO_UT_checkIsNullOrEmpty(
    value: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationTitle]
  ),
  {},
  rule!AS_CO_UT_cast(
    type: 'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Dictionary',
    value: a!map(
      evaluationId: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationId],
      evaluationNumber: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationNumber],
      evaluationTitle: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationTitle],
      evaluationDesc: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationDescription],
      solicitationDesc: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.solicitationDescription],
      solicitationDate: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.solicitationDate],
      evaluationStartDate: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationStartDate],
      evaluationDueDate: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationDueDate],
      evaluationCompletionDate: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationCompletionDate],
      completedBy: rule!AS_CO_UT_cast(
        type: 'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Dictionary',
        value: a!map(
          username: tostring(
            ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.completedBy]
          )
        )
      ),
      evaluationStatus: rule!AS_CO_UT_cast(
        type: 'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Dictionary',
        value: a!map(
          refDataId: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationStatusId]
        )
      ),
      evaluationMethod: rule!AS_CO_UT_cast(
        type: 'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Dictionary',
        value: a!map(
          refDataId: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationMethodId]
        )
      ),
      evaluationChief: rule!AS_CO_UT_cast(
        type: 'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Dictionary',
        value: a!map(
          username: tostring(
            ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationChief]
          )
        )
      ),
      contractingSpecialist: rule!AS_CO_UT_cast(
        type: 'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Dictionary',
        value: a!map(
          username: tostring(
            ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.contractingSpecialist]
          )
        )
      ),
      contractingOfficer: rule!AS_CO_UT_cast(
        type: 'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Dictionary',
        value: a!map(
          username: tostring(
            ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.contractingOfficer]
          )
        )
      ),
      folderId: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.folderId],
      office365FolderId: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.office365FolderId],
      deletionReason: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.deletionReason],
      isActive: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive],
      isWeightedFactorsRequired: a!match(
        value: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.isWeightedFactorsRequired],
        equals: true(),
        then: rule!AS_GSS_UT_displayBooleanAsRequiredNotRequired(bool: fv!value),
        equals: false(),
        then: rule!AS_GSS_UT_displayBooleanAsRequiredNotRequired(bool: fv!value),
        default: null
      ),
      isSignaturesRequired: a!match(
        value: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.isSignaturesRequired],
        equals: true(),
        then: rule!AS_GSS_UT_displayBooleanAsRequiredNotRequired(bool: fv!value),
        equals: false(),
        then: rule!AS_GSS_UT_displayBooleanAsRequiredNotRequired(bool: fv!value),
        default: null
      ),
      isOnSpotConsensus: rule!AS_CO_UT_displayBooleanAsYesNo(
        bool: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.isOnSpotConsensus]
      ),
      isEvaluatorMasked: rule!AS_CO_UT_displayBooleanAsYesNo(
        bool: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.isEvaluatorMasked]
      ),
      idvAwardType: rule!AS_CO_UT_cast(
        type: 'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Dictionary',
        value: a!map(
          refDataId: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.idvAwardTypeId]
        )
      ),
      instrumentType: rule!AS_CO_UT_cast(
        type: 'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Dictionary',
        value: a!map(
          refDataId: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.instrumentTypeId]
        )
      )
    )
  )
)

_a-0000ed8a-02db-8000-9dfc-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_CO_documentDownloadLink

_a-0000ed77-8e71-8000-9df8-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_UT_formatDocumentSingleClickDownloadLink
_a-0000ed77-8e71-8000-9df8-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
if(
  or(
    a!isNullOrEmpty(ri!source),
    a!isNullOrEmpty(ri!appianDocId)
  ),
  null,
  concat(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_getSiteUrl(),
    "webapi/fetchDocumentFromExtSource?source=",
    externalize(ri!source),
    "&appianDocId=",
    externalize(ri!appianDocId)
  )
)

_a-0000e61a-f20f-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel
